items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.content_html: SkyShare is a lightweight ReactJS-based web application designed for seamless sharing of text and files across devices. Inspired by AirForShare, it simplifies sharing by allowing users to save text and upload files, which can then be accessed on any other device.
items.title: AlizaKhan3/SkyShare: SkyShare is a lightweight ReactJS-based web application designed for seamless sharing of text and files across devices. Inspired by AirForShare, it simplifies sharing by allowing users to save text and upload files, which can then be accessed on any other device.
